title: Braum e - Unbreakable vs. Jhin R Curtain call
body:
During this game I experienced an issue with Braum's 3rd ability, Unbreakable.
As per the in game description "He negates the damage of the first attack completely" against a well fought opponent getting us into a situation where he was close to finishing us off with his Ultimate "Curtain call". My cool-down for my Unbreakable came back and I attempted to absorb the final blow to protect my allied Jinx; however the issue that arrose was that i was left on approx 150 hp, and deathfire touch wasn't going to kill me alas I took the shot but all the damage came through.

To finalise, either there is an issue with Braum not being able to negate the damage from Jhin's final shot, or (the unrealistic alternative) it being negated forces all the damage from deathfire touch to go through anyway.

Please fix this, as this is a very major issue.

Regards,

Slendie

replies.body:
I'm not too sure, but there might not be any issue with Deathfire Touch. It's description states "Your damaging abilities cause enemies to take magic damage over 4 seconds". However, there doesn't seem to be any indication of how that's affected when the abilities damage is negated.

Looking at the LoL wiki, I can't find any info on that specific interaction.

It might be worth the effort to try going it a custom with a friend and seeing how Jhin's Curtain Call interacts with Deathfire Touch when applied to the first "damage-negated" instance of Braum's Unbreakable.

A thought, had you taken any hits recently before putting unbreakable up? Kind of a weird thought, but maybe a previous application of dft ate up the 'Stops first ability" part of Braum's unbreakable?
